verses.verse: Therefore, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against <S%H1463>Gog<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, I am against thee, O <S%H1463>Gog<s%>, the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H4902>Meshech<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal<s%>:

And I will turn thee <S%H7725>back<s%>, and leave but the sixth <S%H8338>part<s%> of thee, and will cause thee to come <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3411>parts<s%>, and will <S%H935>bring<s%> thee upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

And I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> thy <S%H7198>bow<s%> out of thy <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and will cause thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> out of thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, thou, and all thy <S%H102>bands<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that is with thee: I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee unto the <S%H5861>ravenous<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> of every <S%H3671>sort<s%>, and to the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> to be <S%H402>devoured<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%>: for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on <S%H4031>Magog<s%>, and among them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>carelessly<s%> in the <S%H339>isles<s%>: and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

So will I make my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and I will not let them <S%H2490>pollute<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> any more: and the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
¶ Behold, it is <S%H935>come<s%>, and it is <S%H1961>done<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; this is the <S%H3117>day<s%> whereof I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

And they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and shall <S%H1197>set<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%> and <S%H5400>burn<s%> the <S%H5402>weapons<s%>, both the <S%H4043>shields<s%> and the <S%H6793>bucklers<s%>, the <S%H7198>bows<s%> and the <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, and the <S%H3027%H4731>handstaves<s%>, and the <S%H7420>spears<s%>, and they shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> them with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>:

So that they shall <S%H5375>take<s%> no <S%H6086>wood<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, neither cut <S%H2404>down<s%> any out of the <S%H3293>forests<s%>; for they shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> the <S%H5402>weapons<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>: and they shall <S%H7997>spoil<s%> those that <S%H7997>spoiled<s%> them, and <S%H962>rob<s%> those that <S%H962>robbed<s%> them, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

¶ And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that I will <S%H5414>give<s%> unto <S%H1463>Gog<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> there of <S%H6913>graves<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H5674>passengers<s%> on the <S%H6926>east<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: and it shall <S%H2629>stop<s%> the noses of the <S%H5674>passengers<s%>: and there shall they <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> and all his <S%H1995>multitude<s%>: and they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> it The <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H1996>Hamon-gog<s%>.
And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> shall the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H6912>burying<s%> of them, that they may <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.

Yea, all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H6912>bury<s%> them; and it shall be to them a <S%H8034>renown<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I shall be <S%H3513>glorified<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

And they shall sever <S%H914>out<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of continual <S%H8548>employment<s%>, passing <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> with the <S%H5674>passengers<s%> those that <S%H3498>remain<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> it: after the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> shall they <S%H2713>search<s%>.

And the <S%H5674>passengers<s%> that pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, when any <S%H7200>seeth<s%> a <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H6106>bone<s%>, then shall he set <S%H1129>up<s%> a <S%H6725>sign<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> it, till the <S%H6912>buriers<s%> have <S%H6912>buried<s%> it in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H1996>Hamon-gog<s%>.
And also the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H1997>Hamonah<s%>. Thus shall they <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.

¶ And, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; <S%H559>Speak<s%> unto every <S%H3671>feathered<s%> <S%H6833>fowl<s%>, and to every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, <S%H6908>Assemble<s%> yourselves, and <S%H935>come<s%>; <S%H622>gather<s%> yourselves on every <S%H5439>side<s%> to my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> that I do <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> for you, even a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that ye may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

Ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, of <S%H352>rams<s%>, of <S%H3733>lambs<s%>, and of <S%H6260>goats<s%>, of <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, all of them <S%H4806>fatlings<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2459>fat<s%> till ye be <S%H7654>full<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> till ye be <S%H7943>drunken<s%>, of my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> which I have <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> for you.

Thus ye shall be <S%H7646>filled<s%> at my <S%H7979>table<s%> with <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, with mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>, and with all <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and all the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H4941>judgment<s%> that I have <S%H6213>executed<s%>, and my <S%H3027>hand<s%> that I have <S%H7760>laid<s%> upon them.
So the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> from that <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H1973>forward<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>: because they <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against me, therefore <S%H5641>hid<s%> I my <S%H6440>face<s%> from them, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H6862>enemies<s%>: so <S%H5307>fell<s%> they all by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
According to their <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> and according to their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> unto them, and <S%H5641>hid<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> from them.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Now will I bring <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and will be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>;

After that they have <S%H5375>borne<s%> their <S%H3639>shame<s%>, and all their <S%H4604>trespasses<s%> whereby they have <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against me, when they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%> in their <S%H127>land<s%>, and none made them <S%H2729>afraid<s%>.

When I have brought them <S%H7725>again<s%> from the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H6908>gathered<s%> them out of their <S%H341>enemies'<s%> <S%H776>lands<s%>, and am <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in them in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>;

Then shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, which caused them to be led into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>: but I have <S%H3664>gathered<s%> them unto their own <S%H127>land<s%>, and have <S%H3498>left<s%> none of them any more there.

Neither will I <S%H5641>hide<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> any more from them: for I have poured <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> upon the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
